content: With more than 1 year of extensive experience of working as an B2B International Sales, I have a customer-focused approach to work and a strong drive to see things through to completion.

In my previous job at Pioneer Material Precision Tech, Inc., I was in charge of working on the smooth development of OEM products, from prototype to ramp up & MP build, communicating with both internal and external to make sure the consolidated information and acceptable schedule planning. There, I was adaptable and managed to drive our team to catch up with Korean end customer's fast-paced business culture , succeeded in transiting project's prototype build to ramp build in 4 months.

Also, I am the Chenchi University graduate with a bachelor’s degree in Korean. During the time, I intentionally immersed myself in a Korean-speaking environment through many customer-centric part-time jobs and 1 year exchange student experience at Seoul. Offering the authentic Korean speaking skills and the deep insight of Korea culture, I am possessing persuasion skills and the crucial ability to work with Korean.
I’m excited to parlay my experience to a more challenging position. Thanks for your time and consideration. I look forward to speaking with you in the near future.
